Data Fields

GTSignedAttribute_st Struct Reference
[Verification]

This is a helper structure to represent a signed attribute and its value.

#include <gt_base.h>

Data Fields

char * attr_type
char * attr_value

Field Documentation

char* GTSignedAttribute_st::attr_type

The attribute OID. A GuardTime timestamp has to contain at least two signed attributes: "1.2.840.113549.1.9.3" (contentType), "1.2.840.113549.1.9.4" (messageDigest).

char* GTSignedAttribute_st::attr_value

The value of the attribute, in base 16.
